description: A declaration of a plural system associated with an account. Stored as a singleton record with the rkey 'self'.

collectiveNoun.description: A collective noun for the system's members (e.g. 'collective', 'system', 'household').

memberCount.description: Optional self-reported total member count. A string to allow values like '20+' or 'many'.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the system record was first created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
